profileAlternative.name: Saket Thakare
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineering Intern at Google
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a results-driven professional with 2 years of experience in software development and deployment. Currently, I am pursuing a Masters of Science in Software Engineering at the San Jose State University specializing in Enterprise Software Technologies along with Cybersecurity.

Being a Full Stack Developer, I am passionate about building scalable and reliable software applications which can offer a good business value proposition to all the stakeholders.

I have good command over various programming languages like Java, Python, C#, and JavaScript.
Being in the IT industry, I have practiced Full-Stack Web Development to build complex software applications with ease.

To further build my expertise as a developer, I endeavored into freelancing and founded Rozrost. Projects we signed were distinct and based on Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Computer Network. We took every project as a challenge and made sure to deliver an end-to-end solution, along with a satisfied client.

I like to call myself a T-Shaped programmer wherein I possess sufficient knowledge about all the components of a full stack product development as well as specializing in Front-end development


Technical Skills:
• Languages: Java, Python, Javascript, TypeScript, C#, C++
• Databases: MySQL, MongoDB
• Web Technologies: Angular, NodeJs, ReactJs, Redux, GraphQL
• Practices: REST APIs, API documentation, Microservices
• VCS: GitHub, GitLab, TFS
• Cloud Providers: AWS, Heroku and Google Cloud
• Build Tools: NPM, Maven, Gradle
• Testing Frameworks: Chai, Mocha, JUnit
• ORMs: Mongoose
• Other: Unity3D, Photoshop, Agile, JIRA
• Middleware: Apache Kafka

positions.title: Cognizant
positions.description:
• Designed critical modules for scaling of 4 transactional portals to handle data of 3000 US hospitals
• Increased portal’s load speed by 16 times by streamlining existing code and configuring the application for AOT build...

positions.title: Co-Founder
positions.description:
• Co-founded Rozrost to acquaint ourselves in the software industry
• Projects were based on Computer Vision, Machine learning, Computer Network.
• Administered requirements gathering, estimations, and development of custom software solution for multiple clients....

positions.title: Summer Intern
positions.description:
• Devised a system to harness unused compute power of the existing workstations, making no impact on users daily operations
• Based on an analysis this system would utilize approximately 70% of a workstation’s idle CPU cycle over a week...

given.text: Saket has been excellent with his technical and functional capabilities and has contributed significantly to the success of the project. He has very good communication skills as well and an excellent team player. He has the never dying energy to keep going in any situation. He is an asset to any team.

items: Sentiment analysis on feature based categorization of product reviews
Learning to detect patterns of crime
Survey On Classification Techniques for Data Mining
